description.english: Get struck by lightning during a storm
Start a run with permadeath mode turned on
Buy 10 items from merchants or city shops
Buy 50 items from merchants or city shops
Buy 100 items from merchants or city shops
Sell 10 items to merchants or city shops
Sell 50 items to merchants or city shops
Sell 100 items to merchants or city shops
Have a character with 10,000 or more gold
Have a character with 100,000 or more gold
Have a character with 1 million or more gold
Fall to the minimum morality level
Learn every spell in the game
Pay 50 gold to a traveling language merchant
Pay 300 gold to a traveling language merchant
Learn a language from a traveling language merchant for free
Get scammed by a traveling language merchant
Kill a creature with a single attack
Die with no gold or losable items in your inventory
Get relocated by the shifting sands
Die by breathing in mysterious gas
Get cursed by a shrine god
Learn all languages permanently (not via accessories)
Fill up all 6 slots in a spellbook
Learn a spell from a scroll
Get trapped in a fairy ring
Learn something from the whispering trees
Overcome the pull of the sapphire storm
Successfully disappear from right in front of a creature
Talk your way out of being robbed
Successfully threaten a creature to back off from trying to rob you
Knock a creature unconscious in combat
